Key Match Events: Croatia defeated Poland 1-0 in the UEFA Nations League match
Pre-Game Insights: Some Croatian fans were left enraged after hearing the Polish anthem right before kickoff, mistaking it for the former Yugoslav one due to their close resemblance
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match reflections provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two sides are now level on points in League A Group 1 of the UEFA Nations League
Others: Dozens of football fans were arrested after fights broke out following the match
Another clash took place later on elsewhere
Two people had been arrested for using pyrotechnics
